rule.name: EAP_SetValueForRefProcess
rule.description: Hold set value rule for Ref Process
rule.definition: if( and( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!processId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!clusterId ), ri!centerId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!isHybridEUC ) ), ri!refProcess, 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:eap}EAP_T_RefProcess'( process_id : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!processId),index(ri!refProcess,"process_id",{}),ri!processId), cluster_id : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!clusterId),index(ri!refProcess,"cluster_id",{}),ri!clusterId), sub_cluster_id: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!eucReferenceNumber),index(ri!refProcess,"euc_reference_number",{}),ri!eucReferenceNumber), name : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!name),index(ri!refProcess,"name",{}),ri!name), description : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!description),index(ri!refProcess,"description",{}),ri!description), region : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!createdBy),index(ri!refProcess,"created_by",{}),ri!createdBy), created_on : is_hybrid_euc:if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!isHybridEUC),index(ri!refProcess,"is_hybrid_euc",{}),ri!isHybridEUC) ) )
